message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $160, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still interested in the product, but $160 is a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we do $155?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $145, but that's as high as I can go.
